vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἔνδειγμα, ατος, τό,
(ἐνδείκνυμι) evidence, ὅτι.. [Refs 5th c.BC+]; token, εὐνοίας [Refs 4th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
evidence, plain indication
a token, evidence, proof, plain indication 2Thess. 1:5*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 證據, 明顯的跡象 (帖後 1:5)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 证据, 明显的迹象 (帖后 1:5)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: chứng cứ; bằng chứng hiển nhiên. Xem G1731
